name: 3.6 & 3.7 "Coach in Love" Parts 1 and 2 Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did Sam have Carla use as a bar rag?
questions.explanation:
Brian the Lion.

	Brian the Lion was Diane's childhood toy. She gave it to Sam when they were dating.

questions.text: What was the name of the woman Coach liked?
questions.explanation:
Irene.

	Irene was played by Bette Ford. They did end up going out.

questions.text: Did Sam date the daughter of the woman Coach was interested in?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Sam agreed to ask the daughter out to help Coach. However, the daughter turned him down every time he asked her out.

Diane's sweater.

	Sam wanted to do something nice and washed Diane's sweater. The problem was he also dried it, causing it to shrink.

questions.text: How did Nick propose to Carla?
questions.correct: "I knocked you up and you know where I live so I guess I gotta."
questions.explanation:
"I knocked you up and you know where I live so I guess I gotta."

	Nick was not known for his class. Carla told Coach about his proposal when Coach was trying to figure out the right thing to say to Irene.

questions.text: What did the woman Coach liked win?
questions.explanation:
two million dollars.

	After she became rich, Irene forgot about Coach. She started to hang out with people who had money.  She even forgot she was engaged to Coach.

questions.text: What did Cliff talk about almost non-stop?
options: his job at the Post Office
questions.explanation:
his trip to Florida.

	No matter what someone said Cliff could always connect it to his trip to Florida. It got so bad everyone tried to avoid talking to him.

questions.text: Who did Coach ask to be his best man?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Coach and Sam went back to Sam's baseball playing days. Because they were so close it seemed appropriate that Coach would ask Sam to be his best man. Sam agreed even though he didn't think there would be a wedding.

questions.text: Did Coach get married in this episode?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Coach planned his wedding despite never hearing from Irene. It wasn't until the last minute that he finally accepted she was not coming back.

questions.text: Who told Coach to "wake up and smell the coffee"?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	Diane was hoping that Coach would be right and there would be a happy ending. But she finally realized that it wouldn't happen and turned out to be the one to tell Coach to face reality.
